title: how to get source code frm .exe file kowing that is made with "go lang"
content:
i  have only  the  .exe and not the source code.i know "GO LANG " was used to compile  file! . I NEED  the source code only because    i will add the cloudflare captcha code needed the get the software back running.another useful informationn is:
The program scrapes a specific website using Selenium, but its anti-bot detection flags it as a bot due to the lack of delays between actions, making it behave unlike a human.I'm certain there’s a way to observe Selenium’s interactions with the browser.

comments.text: Generally you cannot recreate the sources from a compiled executable, because especially meta information like variable and method names are no longer necessary and therefore left out, and optimization applied during the build. However, you can try to decompile (commonly to some other language like C) and invest some (= a lot of) time to edit the result. Depending on the size of the executable, prepare for several weeks of full-time work.
